neighbors.name: Rick Jacobs
neighbors.claims: Rick Jacobs and his wife Lisa own and operate L. Jacobs Farm, a local Wagyu cattle operation focused on high-quality genetics [L. Jacobs Farm](https://www.ljacobsfarm.com/about-us). No record of Jacobs engaging in local government or development debates was found in public sources [Floyd County Commission Minutes (Sep 13, 2022)](https://floydcountyga.granicus.com/MinutesViewer.php?clip_id=25&doc_id=52705b1a-3b62-11ed-8da8-0050569183fa&view_id=1).
neighbors.influence_justification: Farm owner; not in public office

approach_recommendations.engage: Have a local farm peer or extension agent speak with him to establish trust. Emphasize how the project will protect pastureland and ensure his cattle remain safe and undisturbed.

overview_summary: One neighboring landowner was profiled, with no clear stance on the development identified. This neighbor is a cattle farmer with limited public engagement, and none of the profiled neighbors are high-influence community figures.
